code: import React,{useContext,useState}from"react";import{ProfileContext}from"../context/ProfileContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Profiles(){const{profiles,setProfiles}=useContext(ProfileContext);const[newProfile,setNewProfile]=useState("");const addProfile=()=>{if(newProfile.trim()!==""){setProfiles([...profiles,newProfile.trim()]);setNewProfile("");}};const deleteProfile=profile=>{setProfiles(profiles.filter(p=>p!==profile));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-management",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Profile Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-list",children:profiles.map((profile,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:profile}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteProfile(profile),children:"\uD83D\uDDD1 Delete"})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-add",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"New Profile Name",value:newProfile,onChange:e=>setNewProfile(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addProfile,children:"\u2795 Add Profile"})]})]});}
